prompts: Create a cute electric-type Pokemon with big ears and a cheerful expression.

Imagine a tiny Pokemon that loves to play in grassy areas and has a heartwarming smile.

Generate a Pokemon that resembles a small creature with an energetic vibe and vibrant colors.
Make a playful, tiny Pokemon that can be found in forests and urban areas.
